analytics.tipSavings: üí° Tip: Aim to save at least 20% of your income. Start by tracking all expenses and identifying areas where you can cut back.
analytics.tipTracking: üí° Tip: Track at least 20 transactions per month. Use the app regularly to log all your income and expenses for better insights.
analytics.tipConsistency: üí° Tip: Make tracking a daily habit. Set a reminder to log transactions regularly to maintain consistency.
analytics.tipEmergency: üí° Tip: Build an emergency fund that covers 3-6 months of expenses. Start by saving a small amount each month and gradually increase it.
analytics.actionTrack: Track all transactions daily for better consistency
analytics.actionReview: Review your spending patterns and identify unnecessary expenses
analytics.actionGoal: Set up a monthly savings goal and stick to it
analytics.actionEmergency: Create an emergency fund investment category and contribute regularly
analytics.actionBudget: Use the budget feature to plan and control your spending
